name: What They Don't Cover In Angel Training
name_original: What They Don't Cover In Angel Training
description:
A Game Of Ineffable Determinism For 2-4 Players And A Facilitator-Prophet.

You are agents of a higher power. You are the competent of the competent. And you’ve done your basic training.

Now you have to go out into the world and face whatever your divine overlord has decided, in accordance with their unknowable Plan.

It’s going to be fine. Isn’t it?
